version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Added the ability to import your own settings file, so your settings don't get overwritten when updating.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Fixed really bad bug with UI refresh. + Added a system that creates a padding track for smoother zooming. (Needs work)

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: - Removed padding track because it caused jumpy behavior.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Added an experimental vertical centering systems. It can be enabled in the settings.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: Fixed unnecessarily setting the zoom of the master track twice.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Fixed jitter with envelopes caused by not rounding track height. + Added automatic minimum track height detection.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Added the ability to import your own settings file, so your settings don't get overwritten when updating.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Fixed really bad bug with UI refresh. + Added a system that creates a padding track for smoother zooming.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: - Removed padding track because it caused jumpy behavior.

version.author: Alkamist
version.changelog: + Added an experimental vertical centering systems. It can be enabled in the settings.
